= Documentation for Developers =

This documentation is generated from slum source code comments, using epydoc. 

it can be generated automatically from the svn source code, using scons. The only
dependency is that you need to have epydoc installed.

On the links bellow, you should find the latest trunk docs:

[http://hradec.com/slum/doc/index.html online html format] or [http://hradec.com/slum/doc/api.pdf offline pdf format]
